text: Rai Italia is the English language television service of Rai Internazionale, Italy's public national broadcaster. Rai Italia broadcasts around the world on three feeds. The programming it airs is a mix of news, discussion-based programs, drama and documentaries. It also broadcasts sports coverage. This includes four live games per week from Italy's top football league, Serie A. Category:1990s establishments in Italy Category:1992 establishments in Europe Category:Television channels in Italy
title: Rai Italia
